sentences.en: Almost every turn reeled in a marvelously inventive scene.
sentences.cn: 几乎每一轮都在[让人]晕眩在一种极美的创造性场景之中.

sentences.en: And inventive teachers can make their assignments almost cheat - proof.
sentences.cn: 再则,有创造力的教师可以布置出学生无法作弊的作业来.

sentences.en: AQUARIUS: You an inventive and creative creature.
sentences.cn: 水瓶: 你是个集创造与创意于一身的家伙.

sentences.en: He is endowed with an inventive mind.
He was a restless and inventive man who was always trying new things.
sentences.cn: 他是个精力充沛,富有创造性的人,经常要尝试新东西.

sentences.en: He was amazingly inventive and resourceful, and played a major role in my career.
sentences.cn: 他极具创造力，而且足智多谋，在我的职业生涯中起到了重要的作用。

sentences.en: How did the inventive chef ever concoct such strange dish?
sentences.cn: 怎么发明的厨师都编造这种奇怪的菜?

sentences.en: It inspired me to be more inventive with my own cooking.
sentences.cn: 它激发我在自己烹饪时更富创造性。

sentences.en: Miro is the most inventive and entertaining of surrealist painters.
sentences.cn: 米罗是最具创造力和娱乐性的超现实主义画家。

sentences.en: one of the most talented and inventive drummers in modern music
sentences.cn: 现代音乐界最有才华、最有创造力的鼓手之一

sentences.en: She has a highly inventive mind.
sentences.cn: 她的头脑非常善于创新。

sentences.en: This device is the offspring of his inventive mind.
sentences.cn: 这一装置是他那长于发明的头脑的产儿.

sentences.en: Witches, who are inventive and innovative, create better and better brooms.
sentences.cn: 善于创新发明的女巫们改进出愈加出色的扫帚.

sentences.en: You have an inventive and abundant imagination whose creations are extraordinarily real.
sentences.cn: 你的想象力非常丰富而有创造力,你所想象的,都格外的真实.

sentences.en: Your idea seems inventive enough , but I doubt its practicality.
sentences.cn: 你的主意很有创意, 但我对它的实用性有存疑.
